definitions.title: n.pr.[m.] kislew,
definitions.body: ninth month (postex.) = Nov.–Dec., Zec 7:1; ´[[בְּחׂדֶשׁ כ]] Ne 1:1 (Targum id.; loan-word from Bab. kislimu, kislivu, Muss-Arn:JBL 1892, 167; conj. on etym. by Jen:ZA ii, 210, Anm. 3 Hpt:ib. 265, Anm. 2; Palm. [[כסלול]] Vog:No. 24; Gk. xaseleu I Makk 1Ma 1:54).
